document_data.name: Bugbear's Cave
document_data.mainbody: '''The Bugbear's Cave''' was a tavern in [[Hillsfar]] famous for its terrible food, [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]]-watered [[ale]], and excellent gossip.
document_data.Services: Despite the poor quality of the food and drink, both were quite expensive. It was generally recommended to sate your appetite elsewhere before coming to the Bugbear's Cave to gather useful information.
